attributes.action: Award Mohammed Ali a posthumous honorary knighthood.
attributes.background: Arguably boxing's most celebrated athlete, Muhammad Ali lived by his principles, transcended faith, colour and culture. He touched many lives and is in my view THE greatest sportsman of all time. He was more than a sportsman, he was an inspiration to people all over the world.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours

However, at the moment it is not possible for honours to be awarded posthumously.
